ej,appll101,P,romme101,Call at 2B $Tommy O'Brien just beat Luke Appling's throw to 2B; White Sox manager Jack Onslow, Appling, and several others argued the call; Appling ejected by 3B umpire Eddie Rommel1949CHA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

ej,peckh101,P,hubbc901,Catch/trap call $Luke Appling caught Dale Mitchell's line drive near the ground and threw to Cass Michaels, who tagged Frank Papish while Papish was standing on 2B; the play was ruled a catch and a double play; Papish went to the bench and Mitchell stayed on 1B; when Mitchell was belatedly waved out, Papish dashed from the bench toward 1B but was tagged in the coaching box by Chuck Kress; after a long argument with many people, Hal Peck, who was not in the game, was ejected by 1B umpire Cal Hubbard1949CHA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
$Mickey McDermott left with a sore shoulder1949CHA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
